meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rebecca Mathews Christopher Glenn David Bell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3997.

td.p: Rebecca Mathews, an institutional researcher from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Christopher Glenn, an analyst for the federal government from Bridgeport, West Virginia
David Bell, an advertising executive from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,999)

tr.td: CITY SEALS
HONORARY DEGREES
NUMBER, PLEASE
WINE IF YOU MUST
SCRIPTURE SAYETH
BONDS' 73
